about_the_game:
In November 2007, Freightliner announced Project Genesis (unrelated to GE's Genesis series built for Amtrak), a procurement plan for 30 freight locomotives from General Electric (GE). The locomotives ordered were intended to match older types in terms of haulage capacity whilst at the same time being more fuel-efficient. The project was a collaborative effort between Freightliner and GE, with input from drivers on the cab design. 3DZUG developed this modern British locomotive for TRS with the latest PBR techology.

Features:

- BR Class 70 Colas Rail
- Running Numbers
- Realistic model and textures
- Realistic drivers cabin
- Functional windows and sunblend
- Readable script for implementing features to your models
- Wipers
- Cabin displays
- Custom engine and sound
detailed_description:
In November 2007, Freightliner announced Project Genesis (unrelated to GE's Genesis series built for Amtrak), a procurement plan for 30 freight locomotives from General Electric (GE). The locomotives ordered were intended to match older types in terms of haulage capacity whilst at the same time being more fuel-efficient. The project was a collaborative effort between Freightliner and GE, with input from drivers on the cab design. 3DZUG developed this modern British locomotive for TRS with the latest PBR techology.

Features:

- Running Numbers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Drive the highly detailed, modern British GE Class 70 in Colas Rail livery in Trainz. Developed by 3DZUG for TRS19 using the latest PBR technologies, and many custom features!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
